Summary I am the Director of Web Development working on the online efforts for Desk.com. My professional interests are web project management, social media implementation, content strategy, information architecture, and facilitating communication between clients, end-users, web developers, and vendors. I am very experienced with visual and interface design, wireframing, rapid prototyping, and web usability. I'm also involved in front-end development, technical training, and web application development. Sometimes I even use Drupal or Wordpress to help maintain websites.
